text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Bank service corporation" means a corporation:
At least some of the stock of which is owned by a banking institution; and
That is organized to perform bank service corporation activities of the type permitted under applicable provisions of Title 12 of the United States Code to a bank service corporation owned exclusively by national banking associations.
"Management" means the directors, trustees, or other persons exercising similar functions of an association, corporation, business trust, statutory trust, or other similar organization.
